description:
A canyon descended on the approach to Upper Salome Canyon with some amazing features of its own. All stats listed for this canyon are the same as the Upper Salome Canyon since they are effectively one in the same.

The final rappel that drops you into Salome Creek is one of the best slides in the area. It is a 20-foot slide into a 15-foot drop into a hanging pool. Swim across and slither over the pour off and rappel down the rest of the way. Not to be missed.

Approach

Descent

Exit

Red tape
